attributes.action: Only allow over - 60s to be given a free bus pass if they give up their car, if they have a car they cannot have a bus pass.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think this would greatly save money and would make much more sense. For example my grandmother and grandfather are both over 60 and neither of them use their bus passes because they are quite capable of driving themselves places. They think it is ridiculous that they should have a bus pass to use when they don't need it when my brother and I both cannot drive and would use a bus pass much more!
